EmailTemplate.name: No Welcome Link Received
EmailTemplate.subject: React News Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Case.SuppliedName},
I'm sorry to hear this. I have gone ahead and set up his/her accounts manually. He/She will now be able to log in using the following details:
Username: XXX Password: LOGINHELP1
Once they've logged on they will be able to reset their password and adjust preferences.
If you need any additional assistance, please let me know.
Best regards, React News Client Operations requests@reactnews.com
Green Street www.greenstreet.com www.reactnews.com The Monument Building London EC3R 8AF United Kingdom
